title: "Walmart Self-Driving Delivery Service Coming to Three Cities"
excerpt: "Ford Motor Co. and Argo AI have joined forces with Walmart to roll out an autonomous vehicle delivery service in Washington, D.C.; Miami, Fla.; and Austin, Texas. The service is expected to grow to other cities."
